Generate 25 high-quality Anki-compatible flashcards in JSON array format. Follow schema: { "cards": [ { "type": "Q&A|MCQ|Cloze", "front": "...", "back": "...", "explanation": "Detailed (why correct/wrong, refs, Bloom level, layer)", "tags": ["..."], "references": ["..."] } ] } Incorporate: Bloom's progression, active learning hooks, scaffolding layers, distractors (plausible, misconception-based), prior knowledge links (RBAC, Least Privilege).
